ygData.subject: Re: Web sites / demon stuff / this and that
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you take off and put on your shield, the shield should override the dagger picture.  This bug also causes strange things like people with a two-handed
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 11 Jun 1999, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> I saw one the other day when I bought some cheapo little throwing daggers
> and equipped them in my range attack slot...I was holding a Shiney Brass
> Shield (PENDING LORE BTW) and a Combine LS and when I put the tiny daggers
> in Range attack my Shield and Sword disappeared from my external camera view
> (F9) and it looked like I was just holding a dagger.

If you take off and put on your shield, the shield should
override the dagger picture. This bug also causes strange
things like people with a two-handed weapon (halberd)
appearing to wear a shield.

Another glitch I noticed, at least with the female wood elf
graphics, is when playing a brass song, the horn is rotated 90
degrees from where it should be. It looks like I've impaled
myself with the horn with the wide end coming out my back.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
